welcome.title: Welcome to TailorAI
welcome.termsAgreement: By continuing, you agree to our

intro.introDescriptionFirst: Create stunning custom garments with our AI design assistant. From concept to reality, let artificial intelligence help you design the perfect outfit tailored to your style and preferences.
intro.introDescriptionSecond: Try on your designs virtually with our advanced AR technology. Get precise measurements and see how your custom garments will look and fit before ordering.
intro.introDescriptionThird: Order your AI-designed garments with confidence. Our network of expert tailors brings your digital designs to life with premium craftsmanship and perfect fit guarantee.

page1.title: Welcome to the Future of Fashion
page1.subtitle: Experience AI-powered design, virtual fitting, and expert tailoring all in one revolutionary platform.

page2.title: Design with Artificial Intelligence
page2.subtitle: Our AI assistant helps you create unique designs by understanding your style preferences and suggesting perfect combinations.

page3.title: Virtual Try-On Technology
page3.subtitle: See exactly how your custom garments will look and fit using our advanced augmented reality and body measurement technology.

page4.title: Expert Craftsmanship Network
page4.subtitle: Connect with verified master tailors who bring your digital designs to life with exceptional quality and attention to detail.

page5.title: Smart Size Recommendations
page5.subtitle: Our AI analyzes your measurements and preferences to recommend the perfect size and fit for every garment you design.

page6.title: Seamless Design Process
page6.subtitle: From initial concept to final delivery, enjoy a streamlined experience that makes custom tailoring accessible to everyone.

page7.title: Premium Quality Guarantee
page7.subtitle: Every garment is crafted with premium materials and undergoes rigorous quality checks before delivery to your doorstep.

page8.title: Sustainable Fashion Future
page8.subtitle: Create timeless pieces that reduce fashion waste. Design garments you'll love for years with our sustainable approach to custom clothing.
